entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow or rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
